Sentencas: Ba(Zr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2)O3-delta nano-particles were prepared by different wet-chemical synthesis, Pechini (BZCY(P)) and co-precipitation (BZCY(C)), respectively.
Titulo: Characteristics of Ba(Zr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2)O3-δ nano-powders synthesized by different wet-chemical methods for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The BZCY(C) powders have a particle size in range of about 50-150 nm, which is smaller than the BZCY(P) powders with about 500-900 nm.
Titulo: Characteristics of Ba(Zr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2)O3-δ nano-powders synthesized by different wet-chemical methods for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Both the BZCY materials show perovskite structures, but there are impurities in the BZCY (P).
Titulo: Characteristics of Ba(Zr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2)O3-δ nano-powders synthesized by different wet-chemical methods for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the electrolyte density was higher in the BZCY (C) than the BZCY (P).
Titulo: Characteristics of Ba(Zr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2)O3-δ nano-powders synthesized by different wet-chemical methods for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The single cells with BZCY (C) electrolytes exhibited about 0.23 W cm(-2) at 600 degrees C and about 0.31 W cm(-2) at the same temperature were obtained when the anode-functional layer was introduced between the anode and electrolyte.
Titulo: Characteristics of Ba(Zr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2)O3-δ nano-powders synthesized by different wet-chemical methods for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus, the BZCY prepared by carbonate-derived co-precipitation method can be more favorable for high-purity and dense electrolytes in the solid oxide fuel cells than the BZCY prepared by Pechini method.
Titulo: Characteristics of Ba(Zr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2)O3-δ nano-powders synthesized by different wet-chemical methods for solid oxide fuel cells
